participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, she finds joy in crafting and cherishes her relationships.
participant_1.background: My previous job was as a seamstress, and I used to love creating custom quilts for my customers. I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life. I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future. I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe. I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sensitive, he is determined to chase his dreams while carrying the weight of his emotions.
participant_2.background: Leaving my hometown to pursue my dreams. I was sad when my cat died last year. My father was a driver himself. I'm most afraid of people finding out about my weird habit of smelling my own farts. I volunteer at the local humane society.

content.text: What is a dream you are working towards?
I want to move to California to pursue my acting career
Wow, that sounds awesome, I wish you the best of luck!
Thank you! I'm leaving my hometown to do it, but I'm excited.
I'm sure that's scary, but it also sounds like a great opportunity
Thanks, yeah I'm definitely a bit nervous, but I'm also excited!
I can imagine! Well, I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I appreciate the vote of confidence
No problem! What are you most excited about in your new adventure?
I think I'm most excited to meet new people and explore a new city
That sounds great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun
